name: Dance For Your Life
description:
A short rhythm action game! Use WASD or arrow keys to dodge attacks to the beat.

You heal one hit point after dodging 10 in a row (extra health is also stored as reserve). Try to make it to the end!

Made in ~36 hours for Miz Jam 1. I didn't have time to chart everything properly so the music might not sync exactly, I had a lot of fun doing it and learning though!

Art Pack: Kenney 1 bit pack

SFX: Kenney Game Assets

Music: Original composition by my partner :)
